step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally. Remember to exhale as you relax.
Great job opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
You're doing well with the outward arm movement. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Nice work completing the first repetition! You're getting the hang of the outward arm extension and muscle relaxation.
Good start for the second repetition. Keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles.
Great job with the outward movement and opening your fingers. Continue to exhale and relax.
You're maintaining good form with the arm extension. Focus on a full exhale and muscle relaxation.
Fantastic! You've completed both repetitions of the horizontal pumping exercise. You did a great job with the arm movements and muscle engagement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight while inhaling, then open your fingers and relax your muscles as you exhale. Continue practicing these movements to promote lymph drainage.
